newsitem.title: USA: InterDigital bullish on B-CDMA technology.
newsitem.headline: InterDigital bullish on B-CDMA technology.

text.p: InterDigital Communications Corp said Wednesday it made "important progress" in the first quarter on the development of Broadband Code Division Multiple Access technology.
The company said its live demonstration of the technology in March was a key milestone, and has generated a high level of interest from a number of global telecommunications companies.
InterDigital said it is now working toward field trials of B-CDMA wireless local loop systems.
Currently, the company said it intends to conduct trials in Vermont beginning in the fourth quarter.
The company said it is "on track to commercialize the technology in 1998."
